com.metsci.glimpse.jogamp.opengl.util.awt.text

Interface GlyphRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GlyphRendererGL2, GlyphRendererGL3

    public interface GlyphRenderer
    Utility for drawing glyphs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  GlyphRenderer.EventListener
      Observer of a GlyphRenderer.
      static class  GlyphRenderer.EventType
      Type of event fired from the renderer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(GlyphRenderer.EventListener listener)
      Registers an GlyphRenderer.EventListener with this GlyphRenderer.
      void beginRendering(javax.media.opengl.GL gl, boolean ortho, int width, int height, boolean disableDepthTest)
      Starts a render cycle with this GlyphRenderer.
      void dispose(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
      Frees resources used by this GlyphRenderer.

      Draws a glyph with this GlyphRenderer.
      void endRendering(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
      Finishes a render cycle with this GlyphRenderer.

      Forces all stored text to be rendered.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        void addListener(GlyphRenderer.EventListener listener)
        Registers an GlyphRenderer.EventListener with this GlyphRenderer.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to register
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if listener is null

      • beginRendering

        void beginRendering(javax.media.opengl.GL gl,
                    boolean ortho,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    boolean disableDepthTest)
        Starts a render cycle with this GlyphRenderer.
        Parameters:
        gl - Current OpenGL context
        ortho - True if using orthographic projection
        width - Width of current OpenGL viewport
        height - Height of current OpenGL viewport
        disableDepthTest - True if should ignore depth values
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if context is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if width or height is negative
        javax.media.opengl.GLException - if context is unexpected version

      • dispose

        void dispose(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
        Frees resources used by this GlyphRenderer.
        Parameters:
        gl - Current OpenGL context
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if context is null
        javax.media.opengl.GLException - if context is unexpected version

      • drawGlyph

        float drawGlyph(javax.media.opengl.GL gl,
                Glyph glyph,
                float x,
                float y,
                float z,
                float scale,
                com.jogamp.opengl.util.texture.TextureCoords coords)
        Draws a glyph with this GlyphRenderer.
        Parameters:
        gl - Current OpenGL context
        glyph - Visual representation of a character
        x - Position to draw on X axis, which may be negative
        y - Position to draw on Y axis, which may be negative
        z - Position to draw on Z axis, which may be negative
        scale - Relative size of glyph, which may be negative
        coords - Texture coordinates of glyph
        Returns:
        Distance to next character, which may be negative
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if context, glyph, or texture coordinate is null
        javax.media.opengl.GLException - if context is unexpected version

      • endRendering

        void endRendering(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
        Finishes a render cycle with this GlyphRenderer.
        Parameters:
        gl - Current OpenGL context
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if context is null
        javax.media.opengl.GLException - if context is unexpected version

      • flush

        void flush(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
        Forces all stored text to be rendered.
        Parameters:
        gl - Current OpenGL context
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if context is null
        javax.media.opengl.GLException - if context is unexpected version
        IllegalStateException - if not in a render cycle

      • getUseVertexArrays

        boolean getUseVertexArrays()
        Checks if this GlyphRenderer is using vertex arrays.
        Returns:
        True if this renderer is using vertex arrays

      • setColor

        void setColor(float r,
              float g,
              float b,
              float a)
        Changes the color used to draw the text.
        Parameters:
        r - Red component of color
        g - Green component of color
        b - Blue component of color
        a - Alpha component of color

      • setTransform

        void setTransform(float[] value,
                  boolean transpose)
        Changes the transformation matrix for drawing in 3D.
        Parameters:
        gl - Current OpenGL context
        value - Matrix as float array
        transpose - True if array is in in row-major order
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if value's length is less than sixteen
        IllegalStateException - if in orthographic mode

      • setUseVertexArrays

        void setUseVertexArrays(boolean useVertexArrays)
        Changes whether vertex arrays are in use.
        Parameters:
        useVertexArrays - true to use vertex arrays
